author: perezhilton
title: Jay Z & Blue Ivy Are READY To Watch Beyoncé Perform Grammys! CocoPerez.com
text:
The family is in formation!!!
Jay Z and Blue Ivy Carter are front row, gearing up to see Beyoncé perform at the Grammys !!
While we can't wait, Blue looks extra ready in a pink tuxedo and ruffled shirt! Daddy looked sharp too, in navy and black.
Oh, and if anyone criticizes Bey's song/dance tonight, baby Blue will come for them…
[ Image via PBS/ Getty Images .]
Tags: beyonce , blue ivy carter , celeb name , designer , fashion smashion , grammys , jay z , red carpet
